name: PopUp Clicker
description:
Description : 

PopUp Clicker is a game made in 3 weeks with a team of 7 !

The goal was to discover the clicker's type game

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer and Lead of the project

- Lepers Nicolas, Game Programmer

- Adam Aubart, Game Artist 

- Islam Mohima, Game Artist

- Outteryck Romy, Game Designer

- Derisquebourg Gaspard, Game Designer

- Ludovic Charlet, Game Designer

Thanks to our professor Esteves Aurélien and Reynaert Vincent to help us during the project !

How to Play :

You just need to use your left mouse button to play

The game doesn't have backup so when you leave, you lose your progression
